name: Just finished The Sparks Brothers, a fantastic documentary by Edgar Wright about Sparks, an enigmatically beautiful band with eternal relevance. Highly recommended! Looking forward to seeing them at the Hollywood Bowl with They Might Be Giants later this month.

content.html: Just finished The Sparks Brothers, a fantastic documentary by Edgar Wright about Sparks, an enigmatically beautiful band with eternal relevance. Highly recommended! Looking forward to seeing them at the Hollywood Bowl with They Might Be Giants later this month.
